descriptions:
Lands visited by Landorus grant such
bountiful crops that it has been hailed
as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

The energy that comes pouring from its
tail increases the nutrition in the soil,
making crops grow to great size.

From the forces of lightning and wind,
it creates energy to give nutrients to
the soil and make the land abundant.

Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful

From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates
energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the
land abundant.

Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful
crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of
the Fields.”

From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates
energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the
land abundant.

When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus
arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts
abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
name: Landorus
